name: The Shadow Covenant
description: Ancient secrets hide in the shadows,
that has operated from the darkness for centuries.

objectives.prove_loyalty: Prove Your Loyalty to the Covenant

dialogs.start1: The shadows whisper your name, potential initiate.
dialogs.start2: Not all secrets should see the light of day.
dialogs.start3: Are you prepared to walk the path of shadows?
dialogs.progress1: You show promise... but can we truly trust you?
dialogs.progress2: The Covenant's secrets run deeper than you imagine.
dialogs.progress3: Your actions in the shadows will be remembered.
dialogs.complete1: Welcome to the Shadow Covenant, brother/sister.
dialogs.complete2: The shadows are your ally now. Use this power wisely.
